components.name: Constant Velocity Joint (CVJ)
components.function: Connects the drive shaft to the wheel axle while allowing for angular misalignment

components.name: Differential
components.function: Allows the two wheels on an axle to rotate at different speeds during turns

components.name: Axle Half Shaft
components.function: Transmits torque from the differential to the wheel

components.name: U-Joint (Universal Joint)
components.function: Allows the axle half shaft to move up and down while maintaining a constant angle with the drive shaft
